Pre-Game Insights: Memphis and Washington meet in non-conference action.
Memphis finished the 2023-24 season with a 27-55 record, including a 9-32 home record.
Washington finished the 2023-24 season with a 15-67 record, including an 8-33 road record.
The Grizzlies averaged 17.4 points off turnovers, 13.4 second-chance points, and 33.0 bench points last season.
The Wizards averaged 113.7 points per game while allowing opponents to score 123.0 last season.
Several key players from both teams are injured, affecting their lineups.
